summary: Iteration 9: Tested bulk file upload feature. All features working correctly - /api/check/files accepts multiple files and returns combined results with filenames array, /api/check/file (single file) works correctly, Upload File tab shows 'select multiple at once' hint, file input has 'multiple' attribute, UI shows file count and individual names with remove buttons, 'Remove all files' clears selection, CHECK button label changes to 'CHECK X FILES' for multiple files, frontend routes to correct endpoint based on file count.
passed_tests: POST /api/check/files requires authentication (401)
POST /api/check/files with 2 files returns combined results with filenames array
POST /api/check/files with 3 files returns all filenames
POST /api/check/files with empty files returns 400
POST /api/check/files cookie counts sum correctly (valid + expired + invalid = total)
POST /api/check/file requires authentication (401)
POST /api/check/file returns expected result structure
POST /api/check/file with empty file returns 400
POST /api/auth/login with admin key returns token and is_master=true
POST /api/auth/login with invalid key returns 401
POST /api/check (paste cookie) works correctly
Login with admin key PritongTinola*3030 redirects to dashboard
Upload File tab shows 'select multiple at once' hint text
File input has 'multiple' attribute
Multi-file selection shows 'X files selected' count
Individual file names displayed with Ã— remove buttons
'Remove all files' button visible and functional
CHECK button text changes to 'CHECK X FILES' when multiple files selected
CHECK button text shows 'CHECK FILE' when single file selected
Paste Cookie tab works correctly (shows results with expired status)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 9 bulk file upload feature fully implemented and tested: 1) Backend /api/check/files endpoint accepts multiple files via 'files' form field and returns combined results with 'filenames' array. 2) Backend /api/check/file (single file) unchanged and working. 3) Frontend Upload File tab has hint text 'select multiple at once'. 4) File input has 'multiple' attribute allowing multi-file selection. 5) When files selected, shows count ('X files selected'), individual filenames with remove buttons, and 'Remove all files' link. 6) CHECK button dynamically changes label to 'CHECK X FILES' for multiple files. 7) Frontend routes to /api/check/files for multiple files, /api/check/file for single file. All authentication and existing features working correctly.
